Frequently Asked Questions

General

  1. What is the license for Terremark Cloud API?
  2. Does this support Terremark vCloud Express?
  3. Can I contribute back?
  4. How can I report bug/improvements?
  5. Where are the mailing lists?

General

What is the license for Terremark Cloud API?

Terremark Cloud API is released under Apache License 2.0

Does this support Terremark vCloud Express?

No. Currently only Terremark Enterprise Cloud is supported

Can I contribute back?

Sure. Follow the github fork/pull process. See link

How can I report bug/improvements?

Bugs/improvements can be reported at issues

Where are the mailing lists?

Developer mailing list

User mailing list
